World Cuisine Analysis

For the love of food!


Asmita Vikas | Deena Liz John


As people from different countries migrated all over the world, food evolved and gave rise to many new cuisines. People now are exposed to food items outside their native cuisine. This has sparked new restaurants all over the world serving everything from traditional Italian to Peruvian food. With multiple options at the table, how does the world decide where to eat?
This dashboard looks at the most important drivers of peopleâ€™s restaurant preferences and cuisines in around 15 countries across the globe.
